replies.msg: Say the following to your girlfriend: All I want for Christmas is you. You melt me faster than a snowflake

Some women seem to bloom in their early-thirties. For instance Tracy has bloomed into an utterly beautiful creature. Not every man's type of women is the same. Of course everybody likes handsome and beautiful people. In terms of appearance, some men like petite women, some like sporty women, some like svelte women, some like them tall and thin, some like them well-rounded and curvaceous, some like them voluptuous, some like full bust, some like silky feet, some like wide hips, some like curvy legs and so on. In terms of personality, some men like vivacious women, some like kind-hearted and helpful women, some like them compassionate, some like them quiet, some like them sociable and talkative, some like them tactful and diplomatic, some like to be controlled and dominated and so forth. My friend Tom thinks that if a woman without makeup still looks pretty then she's pretty. And there shouldn't be a big difference between with makeup and without. He's a fan of tracy Zhu and samantha Gao, both of whom are exquisitely beautiful women. Like him both of them have an exquisite taste in fashion, shoes, hairstyles, food and interior and exterior design. They're both glamorous women who always dress up in glamorous outfits. They rarely dress down. i once saw tracy dress up in a kimono for a party while samantha was in eighties clothing. Both have a glamorous job and career. Tracy has got a leading role in the new television series whereas samantha has got a supporting role in it. She plays the role of a doctor in it. I consider acting a worthwhile career.

replies.msg: 大家好, 我係一個衰人, 識佐個女仔兩三個月, 可能為佐一開始打造一個好既形象, 我都好多野呃佐佢, 我以前係返過大陸玩既, 掂過好多大陸女人, 但我無話比佢知。我份工普普通通, 養自己就夠, 養家就無咩可能, 大家覺得我應唔應該同佢坦白?但我又好怕失去佐佢。

replies.msg: My friend Charles is a Virgo and was born in 1997. He has received a commission for an article on Picasso from an art magazine. He's doing research in preparation for the article. His girlfriend is also assisting in the preparation of the research. His favourite fighter Dan will be fighting Peter in May for the heavyweight title. Championships like this require proper preparation. The poster and the promo video are in preparation. Dan is doing thorough preparation for this fight as he didn't perform well in his last fight because he did no preparation. Peter didn't seem to have done much preparation for his last fight as well. He almost lost it so this time he's doing meticulous preparation for it including judo, Taekwondo and kickboxing as well as cardiovascular training. Sparring regularly is ideal preparation for a match. You cannot fight a high level fighter without adequate preparation. Paul is making preparations for his ski trip to Osaka. He's also making preparations to meet his favourite band X Japan in Tokyo. So he's preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made for next week's ski festival. The organisations who organise it have announced that preparations for the ski festival are well under way.

Last year my friend Sarah who was born in 1997 got  a king size bed frame and mattress for my birthday. I remember I said "I can't believe you got me a king size mattress and bed frame" They didn't come cheap
